body.p: XHTML documents can be validated in using the same validation features as with any other XML document. In addition, includes a built-in validator engine (W3C XHTML Validator) based upon the W3C Nu HTML Checker that can be used to validate HTML or XHTML documents.

To use the W3C XHTML Validator engine:
Create or edit a validation scenario (e.g. select the Configure Validation Scenario(s) from the Validation toolbar drop-down menutoolbar).
Change the File type column to XML Document and select W3C XHTML Validator in the Validation engine column.
Click OK and Apply Associated to run the validation.
